plot:
Lena Svensson has been offered a new and exiting job in Stockholm that 
she can't say no to. But her husband, Gustav, has no plan of what so 
ever to move from his quiet little town of Vivalla, and especially his 
job as a very proud postman. After Lena started to commute between 
Stockholm and Vivalla, he decides to sell the house and give Stockholm a
 chance. He starts of with a job as a postman in one of Stockholm's 
worst districts, but after a mistake on a conference, Gustav seems to do
 quite a success at his new job, while Lena is struggling with annoying 
colleagues and a demanding boss.  Fuente: IMDb
title: Svensson Svensson - Filmen
